com.informix.jdbc

Class IfxBlob

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.informix.jdbc.IfxObject
      • com.informix.jdbc.IfxBlob

  • public class IfxBlob
extends IfxObject
    Support for Blob datatypes. This class derived from IfxObject class.
    See Also:
    IfxObject
